responsibilities: Deliver high-quality, human annotated, machine learning data at scale for product teams across Apple.
Develop and maintain iOS applications, web applications, cloud-based services, and large-scale data pipelines.
Create automated workflows, services, APIs, and user-interfaces for diverse stakeholders.
Provide insights into key metrics to augment user experiences.
Ensure services are robust, predictable, scalable, monitored, efficient, and highly-available.
Collaborate with designers, product managers, and software engineers to meet customer needs.
qualifications: Expertise in Swift and iOS development.
Experience building front-end applications, web services, or large-scale data pipelines.
Proficiency in modern compiled object-oriented languages such as Swift, Objective-C, Go, C++, or Java.
Experience with automated unit, integration, and acceptance tests.
Experience with modern programming languages like Python or Javascript.
Ability to build highly usable user interfaces using modern Javascript frameworks (e.g., React, Angular).
Experience working in Unix environments (e.g., Darwin, Linux, BSD).
Knowledge of commercial cloud services (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud, Microsoft Azure).
Strong SQL skills and experience with databases.
Excellent collaboration and communication skills with a focus on user experience.
analysis:
The job responsibilities and skills listed do not explicitly mention Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs). The responsibilities focus on delivering high-quality machine learning data, developing iOS and web applications, creating automated workflows, and collaborating with various stakeholders. The skills required include expertise in Swift and iOS development, experience with front-end applications, web services, and data pipelines, proficiency in modern programming languages, and knowledge of cloud services and databases.

While the job involves machine learning data, there is no specific mention of working with GenAI or LLMs. The focus seems to be more on application development, data pipelines, and user interfaces rather than on developing or working with language models or generative AI technologies.

Therefore, based on the provided information, it does not appear that this job involves working with Generative AI or language models.
